title: Boy wounded in Algiers shooting: NOPD
content:
A boy suffered a gunshot wound to his arm in a Monday night (Dec. 19) shooting in Algiers, the NOPD said.
The victim, who is approximately 16 years old, told police he was walking behind a McDonald's in the 3300 block of Garden Oaks Drive when he was shot in the arm by an unknown man.
No further information was immediately available.
